verses.text: Elb'enocab' tastac cuuj, yujto ay jun k'ual ol co cha spac.
A tastac ay d'ayonh, vach' sco pucb'at d'a eb' malaj yico', yujto manh cojtacoc talaj ay junoc chucal sjavi d'a quib'anh d'a yolyib'anhq'uinal tic.
Tato stelvi junoc te te', yalxonhej b'aj sb'at te', scannhej te' b'aj tz'em juan chi'. Tato q'uik' yilji asun, van scot nhab' syal chi'.
Tato scak'och co chum chajtil yilji tiempo b'aj ayonheq'ui, malaj b'aq'uinh tzonh avalvi, malaj pax b'aq'uinh sco mol sat cavb'en chi'.
Manh cojtacoc b'aj scot ik', manh cojtacocpaxi tas tz'aj sq'uib' junoc nene' unin d'a yol sk'ol snun, ichaton chi' manh cojtacoc tastac sk'ulej Dios, aton ix b'oan masanil tas.
Cavejec co b'ab'el avb'en, scavan pax tzak'anilto tz'ochi, yujto manh cojtacoc mach junoc macanh vach' tz'aji, tom a b'ab'el chi', mato a tzak'an chi', mato syak' scha macanhil jun.
Te vach' quilan saquilq'uinal, vach' quilan pax yoc k'u.
Vach'chom tzijtum ab'il squila', palta scak' quip cak'an tzalajb'oc co k'ool. Scham val co naani to nivan tiempo tzonh can d'a campusante, manhxa tas scak' ganar ta', manhxalaj yelk'ochi.

Ex quelemtac yed' ex cob'estac, tzalajanhec yacb'an steton eyip. Aq'uec tzalajb'oc e k'ool yed' tas vach' yacb'an syal eyuuj. Ixiquec b'aj tze nib'ej tzex b'ati, k'ulejec tas tze nib'ej tze k'ulej, palta b'ian scham val e naani to ol ex sch'olb'itej Dios yuj tastac tze k'ulej chi'.
Iq'uequel juntzanh tas tze naub'tanhej d'a e pensar, manh ex och ilk'olal yuj junoc yaelal d'a e nivanil, yujto a jab' stiempoal e quelemal e cob'esal, malaj yelk'ochi, junnhej rato tz'ek'b'ati.
